_source.text: According to Top Gear on the History channel last year (yes, we know the Brit version is better; move on) you can grab a $500 ride almost anywhere that looks like crap but has a heart of gold.

text: According to Top Gear on the **History** channel last year (yes, we know the Brit version **is** **better**; move
on) you can grab a $500 ride almost anywhere that looks like crap but has a heart of **gold**.

_source.text: After better-than-expected GDP data, the current account deficit (CAD) narrowed sharply to 1.7 per cent of GDP in the April-June quarter against 4.8 per cent of GDP in Q1 FY14 mainly due to decline in gold imports and rise in exports.

text: After **better**-**than**-expected GDP data, the current account deficit (CAD) narrowed sharply to 1.7 per
cent of GDP in the April-**June** quarter against 4.8 per cent of GDP in Q1 FY14 mainly due to decline in **gold** imports and rise in exports.

_source.text: Adding a bright lipstick is the perfect way to get noticed and who knows it better than actress Lucy Hale , who rocked a hot pink lip with luxe lashes at the 26th Annual Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards last night?

text: Adding a bright lipstick is the perfect way to get noticed and who knows it **better** **than** actress
Lucy Hale , who rocked a hot pink lip with luxe lashes at the 26th Annual **Nickelodeon** Kids' Choice Awards last night?

_source.text: Added June 6 2007 : over at Pharyngula , commenter Jurjen S. , whose command of history is evidently better than mine, tells me about the League of Militant Atheists , an anti-religious group in the Soviet Union from 1925-1947.
